A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m not sure why so many people hated it\, it seems people either loved it or completely hated it. It didn’t really answer any of my questions\, but I loved this movie. It was not like anything that I heard anyone predict\, so not sure why a lot of people said that it was predictable Disney. I thought it was one of the best Star Wars movies to date\, and I think that the main question of who Rey is will still be answered in the next movie.
